text:
Running 1.3.22

If i have in my httpd.conf
ScriptAliasMatch ^/orders/jter/(.*?)$
/home/vshopper/public_html/cgi-bin/viewOrder.cgi


and i try to add basic authentication to viewOrder.cgi it will not work.  If i
have basic authentication on the /orders/jter is still doesnt work.

The ScriptAliasMatch seems to destroy the ability to to basic authentication.
creator: jter@cartmanager.net
slive@apache.org
text:
This is almost surely a configuration issue rather than a bug.  For help
with configuration issues, please see:
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
We can't help with configuration issues in the bug database.
Thanks for using Apache.
